original_text: Then Amnon hated her with very great hatred, so that the hatred with which he hated her was greater than the love with which he had loved her. And Amnon said to her, “Get up! Go!”
korean_text: 그리하고 암논이 그를 심히 미워하니 이제 미워하는 미움이 전에 사랑하던 사랑보다 더한지라 암논이 그에게 이르되 일어나 가라 하니

sentences.original_text: Then Amnon hated her with very great hatred
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 암논은 그녀를 매우 큰 미움으로 미워하였고

sentences.original_text: the hatred with which he hated her
was greater than the love with which he had loved her.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그녀를 사랑하던 사랑보다 더 컸다
